page.title: About Me
page.body: Hi, I'm Sergio, a Full Stack developer passionate about technology, video games, music, and fitness. I've mainly worked on projects where software directly impacts real-world processes such as operations, security, transportation, and the digitalization of physical workflows.

background.title: Professional Background
background.body: I graduated from Instituto Tecnol√≥gico de Saltillo in 2021 with a degree in Computer Systems Engineering. Before graduating, I joined Introid Inc. as a data engineer on a distributed systems project. I later continued with the team as a Full Stack developer, working across frontend, backend, databases, and infrastructure. After more than three years at Introid, I joined Tienda Tec, where I worked as a Full Stack developer, supporting platforms across different .NET versions and building custom solutions for clients. I participated in requirements gathering, system development, and deployment.

methodology.title: Work Methodology
methodology.body: I like to start by fully understanding the problem, including interaction with end users and requirements gathering. I prefer simple yet robust solutions, focused on maintainability and scalability. I work iteratively, seeking early feedback from the team or client, which helps identify risks and opportunities quickly. I value the use of best practices, standards, and tools that facilitate collaborative work.
